product_name: Icebreaker Everyday Half-Zip Long Underwear Top - Men's
long_description: The men's Icebreaker Everyday half-zip long underwear top is made of lightweight merino wool to keep you warm; a long, ventilating front zip helps you cool down when you want. Merino wool wicks away moisture, dries quickly, breathes to regulate temperature and resists odors naturally. Fabric offers protection from UV light with a rating of UPF 50+. Raglan sleeve construction allows unhindered shoulder movement and flatlock seams reduce chafing. The men's Icebreaker Everyday half-zip long underwear top has a slim fit. Machine washable; line dry or dry flat in shade.
short_description: The men's Icebreaker Everyday half-zip long underwear top is made of lightweight merino wool to keep you warm; a long, ventilating front zip helps you cool down when you want.
